Verses: 1 un Janaththin Puththirarukkaaga Nirkira Periya Adhipadhiyaagiya Migaavel Akkaalaththile Ezhumbuvaan. Yaadhoru Jaadhiyaarum Thondrinadhumudhal Akkaalamattum Undaayiraadha Aabaththukkaalam Varum; Akkaalaththile Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiravargalaagak Kaanappadugira Un Janangal Anaivarum Viduvikkappaduvaargal.
2 boomiyin Thoolile Niththiraipannugiravargalaagiya Anegaril Silar Niththiyajeevanukkum, Silar Niththiya Nindhaikkum Igazhchchikkum Vizhiththu Ezhundhiruppaargal.
3 gnaanavaangal Aagaayamandalaththin Oliyaippolavum, Anegarai Needhikkutpaduththugiravargal Natchaththirangalaippolavum Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Pragaasippaargal.

4 dhaaniyelaagiya Neeyovendraal, Mudivukaalamattum Indha Vaarththaigalaip Pudhaiporulaaga Vaiththu Vaiththu, Indhappusthagaththai Muththiraipodu; Appozhudhu Anegar Ingumangum Odi Aaraaivaargal, Arivum Perugippom Endraan.
5 appozhudhu, Dhaaniyelaagiya Naan Aatrukku Ikkaraiyil Oruvanum Aatrukku Akkaraiyil Oruvanumaagiya Vere Iranduper Nirkakkanden.
6 sanalvasthiram Thariththavarum, Aatrin Thanneergalinmel Nirkiravarumaagiya Purushanai Oruvan Nokki: Indha Aachchariyamaanavaigalin Mudivuvara Evvalavukaalam Sellum Endru Kettaan.

7 appozhudhu Sanalvasthiram Thariththavarum Aatrin Thanneergalinmel Nirkiravarumaagiya Purushan Thammudaiya Valadhukaraththaiyum Thammudaiya Idadhukaraththaiyum Vaanaththukku Neraaga Ereduththu, Oru Kaalamum, Kaalangalum, Araikkaalamum Sellum Endrum; Parisuththa Janangalin Vallamaiyai Sidharadiththal Mudivuperumpodhe Ivaigalellaam Niraiverith Theerumendrum Endrendraikkum Jeeviththirukkiravarperil Aanaiyidak Ketten.
8 naan Adhaik Kettum, Adhinporulai Ariyavillai; Aagaiyaal: En Aandavane, Ivaigalin Mudivu Ennamaayirukkum Endru Ketten.
9 adharku Avan Dhaaniyele, Pogalaam; Indha Vaarththaigal Mudivukaalamattum Pudhaiporulaaga Vaikkappattum Muththirikkappattum Irukkum.
10 anegar Suththamum Venmaiyumaakkappattu Pudamidappattavargalaai Vilanguvaargal. Dhunmaarkkaro Dhunmaarkkamaai Nadappaargal; Dhunmaarkkaril Oruvanum Unaraan. Gnaanavaangalo Unarndhukolluvaargal.
11 andraadapali Neekkappattu, Paazhaakkum Aruvaruppu Sthaabikkappadunkaalamudhal Aayiraththirunootruth Thonnooru Naal Sellum.
12 aayiraththu Munnootru Muppaththaindhu Naalmattum Kaaththirundhu Serugiravan Baakkiyavaan.
13 neeyovendraal Mudivuvarumattum Poyiru; Nee Ilaippaarikkondirundhu, Naatkalin Mudivile Un Sudhandhara Veedhaththukku Ezhundhiruppaai Endraan.
